--- evilgeneeus <Evilgeneeus@...> wrote:
> i KNOW it exists man, but ive been searching for
> MONTHS and i still 
> havent found this game. SOMEBODY PLZ send it to me
> plzplzplzplz!!!!

Someone may offer to send you the original game
directly. You cannot buy it anymore, as far as I know.

Or, you may choose to go to
http://sourceforge.net/snowstorm/ and download a
version of Gladiator that is more likely to work on
your computer.
